author: AP
title: Survey of athletic directors reveals virus outbreak concerns
description: A survey of more than 100 athletic directors across the country finds deep concern for academics and athletic department finances amid the pandemic
content:
Highlights from a survey of more than 100 athletic directors by LEAD1, an association of ADs from Bowl Subdivision schools, and Teamworks:
Q: What are you most concerned about in regards to your student-athletes over the next three months? (99 respondents, s… [+1358 chars]
